Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.cards

Class Card

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.cards.Card
public class Card extends Object
Card is the class, which represents the playing card. A Card object encapsulates information about card:
  • Rank
  • Suit
Author:
Michał Strzeżoń
